desc: The Music Gallery of Highland Park Homepage. Since 1974 we have stayed true to a simple but demanding concept ever since, serve the guitar player. Specializing in Electric Guitars, Basses, and Acoustic Instruments, The Music Gallery has a full repair department and an extensive Music Lesson Program. Learn more here!

layout.text:
Gear, Repairs, Service, & Lessons
on Chicago's North Shore since 1974.
